com.codename1.rad.layouts

Class FanLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codename1.ui.layouts.Layout
      • com.codename1.rad.layouts.FanLayout

  • public class FanLayout
extends Layout

    Like BoxLayout, except if there isn’t enough space to layout the children, it will overlap them, fanning them out.
